org.apache.giraph.partition

类 PartitionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.PartitionUtils

  • public class PartitionUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for Partition related operations.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void analyzePartitionStats(Collection<PartitionOwner> partitionOwnerList, List<PartitionStats> allPartitionStats)
      Check for imbalances on a per worker basis, by calculating the mean, high and low workers by edges and vertices.
      static int computePartitionCount(Collection<WorkerInfo> availableWorkerInfos, int maxWorkers, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf)
      Compute the number of partitions, based on the configuration.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • analyzePartitionStats

        public static void analyzePartitionStats(Collection<PartitionOwner> partitionOwnerList,
                         List<PartitionStats> allPartitionStats)
        Check for imbalances on a per worker basis, by calculating the mean, high and low workers by edges and vertices.
        参数:
        partitionOwnerList - List of partition owners.
        allPartitionStats - All the partition stats.

      • computePartitionCount

        public static int computePartitionCount(Collection<WorkerInfo> availableWorkerInfos,
                        int maxWorkers,
                        ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf)
        Compute the number of partitions, based on the configuration.
        参数:
        availableWorkerInfos - Available workers.
        maxWorkers - Maximum number of workers.
        conf - Configuration.
        返回:
        Number of partitions for the job.
